content: Sterling Bancorp  said it would buy Astoria Financial Corp  in an all-stock deal valued at about $2.2 billion to create the sixth largest regional bank in the New York City area by deposits.
name: Sterling Bancorp
title: Regional bank Sterling Bancorp to buy Astoria for $2.2 billion

content: March 7 Sterling Bancorp said it would buy Astoria Financial Corp in an all-stock deal valued at about $2.2 billion to create the sixth largest regional bank in the New York City area by deposits.
name: Sterling Bancorp
title: UPDATE 2-Regional bank Sterling Bancorp to buy Astoria for $2.2 bln

content: March 7 Sterling Bancorp said on Tuesday it would buy Astoria Financial Corp in an all-stock deal valued at about $2.2 billion to create the sixth largest regional bank in the New York City area by deposits.
name: Sterling Bancorp
title: Sterling Bancorp to buy Astoria Financial for $2.2 bln
